data: To you, the third-level intellect who has been guided to this imperishable container and who is able to break the Seal and to read this tape, and to your fellows, greetings:
Smith, E. E. (Edward Elmer), 1890-1965; Rogers, Hubert, 1898-1982 [Illustrator]
